text: The unexamined life is not worth living
author: Socrates

text: If you realize that all things change, there is nothing you will try to hold on to
author: Lao Tzu

text: The ones who are crazy enough to think that they can change the world, are the ones who do
author: Steve Jobs

text: Don’t live your life through what-ifs, live it with I knows
author: Marco Zuniga

text: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough
author: Mae West

text: It’s strange that they fear death. Life hurts a lot more than death
author: Jim Morrison

text: Action may not always bring happiness, but there is no happiness without action
author: William James

text: For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: A day without laughter is a day wasted
author: Nicolas Chamfort

text: May you live every day of your life
author: Jonathan Swift

text: Life is not a problem to be solved but a reality to be experienced
author: Soren Kierkegaard

text: It does not matter how slowly you go, as long as you do not stop
author: Confucius
